stories.text:
Gain on discussion - 1. Reinforcement learning of the important concept. 2. Learn and share the startup experience and analysis of the experience from the lens of the related YC Concept 3. Discussion over the google meet with screen sharing can bring the things more clarity

How to start the discussion ? 1. Let’s connect first via any of the below methods 1. Send message on telegram at https://t.me/manishag777 2. Send e-mail to manishag777@gmail.com 3. You can also share your contacts over the comment. I’d reach out to you or the other person with similar interest may also do the same 2. After connection decide the common video/topic for discussion with common availability time
stories.title: Does anyone want to do one-to-one discussion over YC videos?
